# [Interview #716: Twitter 2012 (WoT), Entry #24](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=716#24)

#### [Terez (24 September 2012)](https://twitter.com/Terez27/status/250269126482870272)

Did Hessalam come from RJ's notes? We're asking for a very specific reason. :) (But it's not a gotcha question, promise.)

#### [Brandon Sanderson (24 September 2012)](https://twitter.com/BrandSanderson/status/250369229512126464)

It was not me.
